name: The Radioactive Adventures of Tim
description:
You play as Tim. And you have to collect all the radioactive goop from the level. Um.. tasty goop! Anyway, you can move around with W,A,S,D and jump with . If the music gets too annoying, mute it with . 

This was a fun experience. I got to make pixel art for the first time, and even a full tileset. I tried creating music/sound effects but I realized I wont make it to the deadline. So i used music from this wonderful pack - https://cathran-music.itch.io/true-8-bit-music and sound effects from this one - https://phoenix1291.itch.io/sound-effects-pack-2.

This game was made as part of the 1-bit game jam!
The source code is available here - https://github.com/gamedolphin/radioactive-tim
